name: Sei
headline: AI-powered Regulatory Compliance Platform
description: Simplify your regulatory compliance. Sei's AI agents sit alongside your risk and compliance teams, amplifying impact and scale

founders.name: Pranay Shetty, Founder
founders.description: Pranay is the CEO of Sei. He has worked across investment banking, private equity, and fintech. Most recently he was an early employee at CloudKitchens, helping launch the business across the US & Asia.

founders.name: Ramkumar Venkataraman, Founder
founders.description: Engineer with over a decade building payments and high-scale systems in PayPal, Wise, and Amazon. Believes in the power of AI to help create responsible brands

# Compliant AI Agents for Financial Institutions
Sei is an AI platform for CX and Compliance teams. Simplify your customer support, collections, compliance workflows and others.
[Schedule a Demo](https://seiright.com/<#reachUs>)[Watch Sei AI in Action](https://seiright.com/<#demo>)
### Trusted by
Trusted by listed financial institutions and banks
75% increase in customer NPS
60% reduction in handle times
FEATURES
## AI agents to interact with customers and manage compliance
### AI Agents for Customer Conversations
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Sei AI agents can interact through voice, email, and chat to handle verification workflows, collect payments, process due date changes, handle account enquiries, handle fraud/disputes, etc.
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Reduce average handle time by 75%. Optimise your sales outreach by calling at customer's preferred times. Customise with your policies and rulebooks
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Adhere to TCPA, UDAAP and other regulations
![AI Agents for Customer Conversations](https://seiright.com/images/home-grid-1.png)
### AI Agents for Complaints and Compliance
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Sei AI can ingest custom policies, understand regulations, escalate fraud and legal concerns, flag complaints on unfairness, product issues, privacy violations, and more
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Manage VoC programs, perform RCAs and handle escalations in real-time
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Get alerted in real-time on serious escalations and proactively resolve complaints
![AI Agents for Complaints and Compliance](https://seiright.com/images/home-grid-2.png)
### AI Agents for QA and Agent Productivity
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Reduce post-call time with auto summarisation and ticket tagging, allowing agents to be more productive
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Sei AI agents automates repetitive workflows of QA & Risk analysts, gives you unprecedented control over your compliance programs
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Use our coaching opportunities module to provide continuous feedback to agents - human and AI
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Onboard in a week with your custom policies & SOPs and our AI agents will ensure strict adherence, improving compliance
[Schedule Demo](https://seiright.com/<#reachUs>)
![AI Agents for QA and Agent Productivity](https://seiright.com/images/home-grid-3.png)
### Multimodal AI Agents for Workflows
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Unify fragmented workflows across customer support, QA and product like claims processing, impound management, etc.
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Out-of-the-box integrations with your payment processors, loan management systems and contact center platforms
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Sei AI can analyse calls, emails, chats, social media, images, documents, audio, video, and more, providing real-time feedback
![Check](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/tick.1af0b9d2.svg)
Sei AI can interact with your customers across 15+ languages.
[Get Started](https://seiright.com/<#reachUs>)
![Multimodal AI Agents for Workflows](https://seiright.com/images/home-grid-4.png)
Demo
## Watch our QA AI Agent in Action
#### SEI EFFORTLESSLY INTEGRATES WITH YOUR EXISTING TOOLS
SECURITY
## Built with a commitment to security and privacy
![GDPR Ready](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/GDPR.1e44745b.svg)
![SOC2 Type-2](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/soc2.a61364c7.png)
![100% Auditability](https://seiright.com/_next/static/media/AUDIBILITY.62fb365c.svg)
FAQ
## Just ask, you will get
### How securely is my data stored in Sei's systems?
We deploy our systems and models in the cloud within private VPCs. Each customer's data resides in sandboxed environments. We are SOC2 Type 2 compliant with regular penetration testing
### Can Sei incorporate my SOPs and guidelines?
Sei is designed with customisability as its core. Bring your own policies, guidelines and SOPs
### How is Sei different from other Voice AI platforms?
Sei is built with a compliance-first approach. Our models are trained on consumer protection regulations. Every single interaction is audited against regulations and rulebooks. We have strict guardrails to ensure privacy and prevent leakage of sensitive information and unauthorised disclosures
### How frequently are the compliance guidelines updated?
Our AI agents regularly monitor for regulatory changes and incorporate the same. We can also monitor your policy changes dynamically and update the AI models
### Does Sei AI integrate with the tools and platforms my company uses?
We integrate with your payment processors, loan management systems and CCaaS software. We also support custom integrations at the time of onboarding
### What is the level of support Sei provides?
We have a dedicated account managers for each customer. We will open up a private Slack channel along with email and call support with strict SLAs
[Book a Demo](https://seiright.com/<#reachUs>)
# Reach out for a personalised demo
Sei AI saves up to 70% in costs by automating manual repetitive workflows for CX, compliance, and operations teams, so you can grow faster.
### Book your demo now

generated_description:
### Sei: Your AI-Powered Compliance Partner

Sei is an innovative startup on a mission to redefine regulatory compliance through the power of artificial intelligence. Founded in 2023 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W22, Sei emerged from the idea to simplify regulatory compliance processes. Based in Delhi, India, and leveraging a small yet dynamic team, Sei is dedicated to enhancing the effectiveness and scalability of risk and compliance operations by deploying AI agents that work alongside human teams.

**Why Sei?**  
Sei positions itself as a specialized AI platform for customer experience (CX) and compliance teams, aiming to streamline various processes such as customer support, collections, and compliance workflows. The platform's billing point is its ability to drastically improve metricsâ€”reporting a 75% increase in customer Net Promoter Score (NPS) and a 60% reduction in handle times.

**Key Features of Sei's AI Agents:**

1. **Multichannel Interaction**: Sei's AI agents can communicate via voice, email, and chat, allowing them to handle tasks like payment collections, account inquiries, and verification workflows efficiently.
   
2. **Compliance Management**: The agents are designed to manage compliance tasks by ingesting custom policies, monitoring regulatory changes, and providing real-time alerts for escalated fraud or legal concerns.

3. **Quality Assurance and Agent Productivity**: By automating repetitive workflows, Sei's AI can reduce post-call times and enhance productivity among human agents, facilitating better quality assurance processes.

4. **Multimodal Workflows**: Sei integrates with various platforms, providing seamless interaction across customer support, quality assurance, and product teams, while also supporting over 15 languages.

5. **Security First**: Understanding the sensitivity of data in financial institutions, Sei is built with a strict compliance framework and is SOC2 Type 2 compliant, ensuring high standards of data privacy and security.

**Get Involved**  
Sei is forging relationships with various industries, including banks, fintechs, and insurance. With its AI solutions, businesses can significantly cut costsâ€”up to 70%â€”by automating manual and repetitive workflows.

If youâ€™re looking to scale your compliance and customer support operations with AI but arenâ€™t sure where to start, Sei offers personalized demos to showcase how their technology can fit into your existing systems.

**Want to Learn More?**  
Check out their website [Sei Right](https://seiright.com/) for more details and to schedule a demo. 

In a world where compliance is non-negotiable and efficiency is key, Sei is here to ensure you donâ€™t just keep upâ€”you get ahead.
